60#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KSTAT_H_
61#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KSTAT_H_
62
63#include <sys/sysctl.h>
64
65#define KSTAT_TYPE_NAMED 1
66
67#define KSTAT_FLAG_VIRTUAL 0x01
68
69#define KSTAT_READ 0
70#define KSTAT_WRITE 1
71
72typedef struct kstat {
73 void *ks_data;
74 u_int ks_ndata;
75#ifdef _KERNEL
76 struct sysctllog *ks_clog;
77 const struct sysctlnode *ks_node;
78#endif
79 int (*ks_update)(struct kstat *, int); /* dynamic update */
80 void *ks_private; /* arbitrary provider-private data */
81} kstat_t;
82
83typedef struct kstat_named {
84#define KSTAT_STRLEN 31
85 char name[KSTAT_STRLEN];
86#define KSTAT_DATA_CHAR 0
87#define KSTAT_DATA_INT32 1
88#define KSTAT_DATA_UINT32 2
89#define KSTAT_DATA_INT64 3
90#define KSTAT_DATA_UINT64 4
91 uchar_t data_type;
92#define KSTAT_DESCLEN 128
93 char desc[KSTAT_DESCLEN];
94 union {
95 uint64_t ui64;
96 } value;
97} kstat_named_t;
98
99kstat_t *kstat_create(char *module, int instance, char *name, char *class,
100 uchar_t type, ulong_t ndata, uchar_t flags);
101void kstat_install(kstat_t *ksp);
102void kstat_delete(kstat_t *ksp);
103void kstat_set_string(char *, const char *);
104void kstat_named_init(kstat_named_t *, const char *, uchar_t);
105
106#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KSTAT_H_ */
107
